imdb.plot outline: The Choice with Ralph & Vicki is everything you have come to expect from 'North America's Favorite Hunting Couple' Ralph and Vicki Cianciarulo, and the POSSE. Each week is packed with exciting adventure in the true sense of reality hunting and no one does it better! Not ones to stretch out just one hunt an episode, Ralph and Vicki pack each week full with true hunting at its best. The ups, the downs and all the in-betweens are what make the viewers come back each week to watch real hunting with real people and real adventures.
imdb.title: The Choice
plot: Ein Ex-Killer ist dabei herauszufinden, dass keine gute Tat ungestraft bleibt.

_The Choice_ (qv) with Ralph & Vicki is everything you have come to expect from 'North America's Favorite Hunting Couple' Ralph and Vicki Cianciarulo, and the POSSE. Each week is packed with exciting adventure in the true sense of reality hunting and no one does it better! Not ones to stretch out just one hunt an episode, Ralph and Vicki pack each week full with true hunting at its best. The ups, the downs and all the in-betweens are what make the viewers come back each week to watch real hunting with real people and real adventures.
